articles.title: Double win for Europe: Sentinel-1C and Vega-C take to the skies - European Space Agency
articles.description: The third Copernicus Sentinel-1 satellite was launched on a Vega-C rocket from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana. Sentinel-1C extends the legacy of its predecessors, delivering high-resolution radar imagery to monitor Earth’s changing environment, supportin…
